name: create_histogram
description: Create a histogram chart from a list of values or from a file (CSV, Excel, JSON, JSONL). Supports bin settings, range, and axis labels.

data.description: Direct input data to draw the histogram (ignored if file_path is provided)

file_path.description: Optional path to data file (.csv, .xlsx, .json, .jsonl) to load data from

sheet_name.description: Sheet name or index (only used for Excel files)

data_source.description: Column name or row index from file to use as data source

bins.description: Number of bins to divide the data into

bin_range.description: Tuple (min, max) specifying the range of histogram bins

color.description: Color of the bars in the histogram

save_path.description: Where to save the resulting image (e.g., ./output.png)
